pkgmetadata.longdescription: Likelihood-Based Confidence Interval in Structural Equation Models // Forms likelihood-based confidence intervals (LBCIs) for parameters in structural equation modeling, introduced in Cheung and Pesigan (2023) doi:10.1080/10705511.2023.2183860. Currently implements the algorithm illustrated by Pek and Wu (2018) doi:10.1037/met0000163, and supports the robust LBCI proposed by Falk (2018) doi:10.1080/10705511.2017.1367254.
